name: google-ads-reports

output.text: Please note that each row of data returned will represent one data bundle; therefore, you may want to consider using the Array aggregator (or other aggregators) right after this module to consolidate the data further in order to prevent high operations consumption.

customMessage.name: customMessage
customMessage.label: Custom Message

temp.query: SELECT campaign.id, campaign.name FROM campaign ORDER BY campaign.name DESC
temp.queryWithName: SELECT campaign.id, campaign.name FROM campaign WHERE campaign.name LIKE '{{parameters.campaignName}}' ORDER BY campaign.name ASC

listCampaigns.name: listCampaigns
listCampaigns.label: List Campaigns

output.text:
Please note that each row of data returned will represent one data bundle; therefore, you may want to consider using the Array aggregator (or other aggregators) right after this module to consolidate the data further in order to prevent high operations consumption.

Also note that by default Google Ads API provides cost in `micros`. For most of the currencies, you need to divide `Cost Micros` by 1000000 to get the actual `Cost` and that is what we already do for you in the `Cost` metric.

generalMessage.name: generalMessage
generalMessage.label: General Message

body.query: SELECT customer_client.id, customer_client.descriptive_name, customer_client.manager, customer_client.status FROM customer_client WHERE customer_client.manager = false AND customer_client.status != CANCELED

listCustomerClients.name: listCustomerClients
listCustomerClients.label: List Customer Clients

label: Google Ads Reports

runCustomReport.name: runCustomReport
runCustomReport.label: Run a Custom Report

expect.help: Reports cannot be requested for a manager or canceled account.
expect.name: accountId
expect.label: Account ID

expect.help: Please enter your GAQL query here. We higly recommend you validate your query with [this tool](https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/fields/v16/ad_group_ad_query_builder). Keep in mind the validation tool is not always 100% perfect. Some queries will be returned as correct and they will still not work in Make because, for example, certain metric combinations are not possible to use in real API calls and the validation tool does not know all possible combinations.
expect.name: query
expect.label: Query

runCustomReport.expectJsonc:
[
    "rpc://customMessage",
    {
        "name": "accountId",
        "type": "select",
        "options": "rpc://listCustomerClients",
        "label": "Account ID",
        "help": "Reports cannot be requested for a manager or canceled account.",
        "required": true
    },
    {
        "name": "query",
        "type": "text",
        "label": "Query",
        "help": "Please enter your GAQL query here. We higly recommend you validate your query with [this tool](https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/fields/v16/ad_group_ad_query_builder). Keep in mind the validation tool is not always 100% perfect. Some queries will be returned as correct and they will still not work in Make because, for example, certain metric combinations are not possible to use in real API calls and the validation tool does not know all possible combinations.",
        "required": true
    },
    {
        "name": "limit",
        "type": "number",
        "label": "Limit",
        "default": 10,
        "help": "Maximum number of returned results (bundles)."
    }
]

temp.query: SELECT segments.date, customer.id, customer.descriptive_name, campaign.id, campaign.name, metrics.impressions, metrics.engagements, metrics.clicks, metrics.cost_micros, metrics.conversions, metrics.conversions_value, metrics.all_conversions, metrics.all_conversions_value, metrics.phone_calls, metrics.phone_impressions, metrics.search_click_share, metrics.search_impression_share, metrics.search_exact_match_impression_share, metrics.search_top_impression_share, metrics.search_absolute_top_impression_share, metrics.video_views, metrics.view_through_conversions, metrics.gmail_forwards, metrics.gmail_saves, metrics.gmail_secondary_clicks FROM campaign WHERE segments.date BETWEEN '{{formatDate(parameters.startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' AND '{{formatDate(parameters.endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' ORDER BY segments.date DESC
temp.queryWithCampaignIDs: SELECT segments.date, customer.id, customer.descriptive_name, campaign.id, campaign.name, metrics.impressions, metrics.engagements, metrics.clicks, metrics.cost_micros, metrics.conversions, metrics.conversions_value, metrics.all_conversions, metrics.all_conversions_value, metrics.phone_calls, metrics.phone_impressions, metrics.search_click_share, metrics.search_impression_share, metrics.search_exact_match_impression_share, metrics.search_top_impression_share, metrics.search_absolute_top_impression_share, metrics.video_views, metrics.view_through_conversions, metrics.gmail_forwards, metrics.gmail_saves, metrics.gmail_secondary_clicks FROM campaign WHERE segments.date BETWEEN '{{formatDate(parameters.startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' AND '{{formatDate(parameters.endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' AND campaign.id IN ({{join(filterItems(parameters.campaignIDs), ', ')}}) ORDER BY segments.date DESC

body.query: SELECT segments.date, customer.id, customer.descriptive_name, metrics.impressions, metrics.engagements, metrics.clicks, metrics.cost_micros, metrics.conversions, metrics.conversions_value, metrics.all_conversions, metrics.all_conversions_value, metrics.search_impression_share, metrics.search_exact_match_impression_share, metrics.video_views, metrics.view_through_conversions FROM customer WHERE segments.date BETWEEN '{{formatDate(parameters.startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' AND '{{formatDate(parameters.endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}' ORDER BY segments.date DESC
